attributes.action: Undertake to do whatever is necessary to prevent Tony Blair ever becoming President of The EU.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has been reported that Tony Blair is being touted as the first president of the EU, by none other than Nicolas Sarkotzy.

Should this man ever be elevated to such a position, it would represent a moral outrage too far.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
